title: Rhododendron Shrubs
name: Rhododendron shrubs
rationale: LightGBM provided the best quantitative performance.
description: The Rhododendron shrubs diagnostic species set consists of all Rhododendron taxa that occur in Alaska and Yukon with typical growth form less than 1 m tall (see species list below). Rhododendron shrubs are common and widespread throughout the map domain, except the central and eastern Aleutian Islands. We do not include Rhododendron menziesii Craven (formerly known as Menziesia ferruginea Sm.) because it typically grows in coastal rainforests and exhibits a taller growth habit, being generally taller than 1 m. Some of the Rhododendron taxa that occur in Alaska have been commonly known under the genus Ledum in the past.
